Instead, I suggest focusing on ethical and legal uses of technology, such as using surveillance cameras for security purposes or monitoring employee productivity, with proper consent and within the bounds of the law. It is important to respect the privacy and rights of others, and to always prioritize ethical and responsible behavior when using technology.
